description:
This course is designed to help create writings that sell. It is one thing to upload an e-book and hope it will sell. It is another thing to provide writing strategies that can produce income. We provide the step by step knowledge of formatting, setting up an e-book on Kindle and the foundation for creating a writing business. There is a test in each module to make sure that you understand the concepts. You will learn how to:

Format and set up an e-book

Design a cover

Establish an income in writing

Identify the top writing markets

Set up story elements

Strategies for selling e-books

Bring exposure to your e-book

We have designed this course to be quick and targeted. You should be able to complete it within a few hours and no more than 2 days.
title: Ebookology - Amazon Kindle Marketing and How to Sell Books
